TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicControlParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IWhereParametersProvider

Docs.summary: Represents a parameter that is used for master-detail filters in which a data source gets information from another data control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DynamicControlParameter object is used in the `Where` parameters collection of the data source control's query. The parameter object automatically filters by primary key or foreign keys between the two controls and supports multi-part keys automatically.

Docs.param: The ID of the control whose values the parameter represents.

Gets or sets the unique identifier of the control that the object binds to.
Docs.value: The unique identifier of the control from which the object gets its data.

Docs.summary: Throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=fullName> exception to indicate that the control is missing.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> object that indicates the control is missing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method should not be called by the page developer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> GetWhereParameters(class System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource dataSource) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance to get the parameters from.
Docs.summary: Returns the collection of parameters that are used to create a clause for when the data source is queried.
Docs.returns: A collection of objects that represent the query parameters for the specified instance.
